snippet.title: Ghostbusters: Rise of the Ghost Lord | Story Trailer | Meta Quest 2 + 3 + Pro
snippet.description:
Who is the Ghost Lord? Why is he in San Francisco? Why is he obsessed with the Ghostbusters?

With this new easter egg packed story trailer for Ghostbusters: Rise of the Ghost Lord, Sony Pictures VR drops new details on the origin of the larger-than-life supervillain and his connection to the Ghostbusters.

Ghostbusters: Rise of the Ghost Lord is set to unleash the undead this fall. If you ain’t afraid of no ghost; add it to your wishlist today! https://metaque.st/42gXmcl

For more information about Ghostbusters: Rise of the Ghost Lord, stay tuned to GhostbustersVR.com, follow @sonypicturesvr and @ghostbusters on Instagram, Facebook and Twitter. And follow @nDreams on Twitter, @nDreamsVR on Facebook and @nDreams_VR on Instagram.
